##Table
>des Table表格组件

```
import React,{ Component } from 'react';
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import style from './index.css';

export class Table extends Component{
    render() {
        return (
            <table className={style["common__table"]}>
                {this.props.children}
            </table>
        );
    }
}

/**
 * 表头显示
 *<TableHeader thArr=["表头th项","表头th项"]/>
 */
export class TableHeader extends Component{
    render() {
        return (
            <thead className={style["common__table--header"]}>
                <tr>
                    {this.props.children}
                    {this.getTrContent()}
                </tr>
            </thead>
        );
    }
    getTrContent(){
        let {thArr=[]} = this.props;

        return thArr.map((th,key)=>{
            return(
                <th key={key} title={th}>{th}</th>
            )
        })
    }
}

/**
 * 表格内容项
 * < TableBody bodyData = [需要显示的表格内容] tdArr = [循环的td字段["field1", "field2", "field3", ]] > < /TableBody>
 */
export class TableBody extends Component{
    render() {

        return (
            <tbody className={style["common__table--body"]}>
                {this.props.children}
                {this.getContent()}
            </tbody>
        );
    }
    getContent(){
        let {bodyData=[],tdArr=[]}  = this.props;

        return bodyData.map((item,key)=>{
            return(
                <TableTr {...self.props} clickEvent={id=>{this.handleClick(item.id)}} key={key} item={item} tdArr={tdArr}>
                    {
                        this.props.extRows ? 
                        this.props.extRows[key] : null
                    }
                </TableTr>
            )
        })
    }

    // 行点击事件 确保数据流的行数据中有 id 字段 否则无法触发
    handleClick(id){
        let { clickEvent } = this.props;
        id && clickEvent && clickEvent(id)
    }
}

export class TableTr extends Component{
    render() {
        return (
            <tr onClick={this.props.clickEvent}>
                {this.getTdContent()}
                {this.props.children}
            </tr>
        );
    }
    getTdContent(){
        let {tdArr=[],item} = this.props;
        
        return tdArr.map((td,key)=>{
            return(
                <td key={key} title={item[td]}  onClick={this.props.onClick}>{item[td]}</td>
            )
        })
    }
}

/**
 *  为了让不为零的td项有底线可点击
 */
export class TableTd extends Component{
    render() {
        return (
            <td> 
                <span className={style["bubble__tips"]} name={this.props.text||'nothing'} 
                    data-tips={this.props.text}>
                </span>
                {this.props.children} 
            </td>
        );
    }
}
```

##说明

`<Table></Table>`

`<TableHeader></TableHeader>`   <TableHeader thArr=["表头th项","表头th项"]

`< TableBody> </TableBody>`  bodyData = [需要显示的表格内容] tdArr = [循环的td字段["field1", "field2", "field3", ]] 

`<TableTr></TableTr>`  tdArr为循环字段,item为该行数据

`<TableTd></TableTd>`  td需要显示内容  

##最终使用结构如下

```
<Table>
	<TableHeader></TableHeader>
	<TableBody>
		<TableTr>
			<TableTd></TableTd>
		</TableTr>
	</TableBody>
</Table>
```
